tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE game_schedule (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_date DATE,
    game_time TIME,
    home_team VARCHAR(50),
    away_team VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE player_statistics (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR,
    points_scored INT,
    assists INT,
    rebounds INT
);

CREATE TABLE game_schedule (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_date DATE,
    game_time TIME,
    home_team VARCHAR(50),
    away_team VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE player_statistics (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    games_played INT,
    points_scored INT
);

CREATE TABLE team_stats (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    total_games_played INT,
    total_wins INT,
    total_losses INT
);

CREATE TABLE broadcast_schedule (
    broadcast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    broadcast_date DATE,
    broadcast_time TIME,
    broadcast_channel VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE games (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_date DATE,
    game_time TIME,
    stadium_name VARCHAR(50),
    broadcast_channel VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE teams (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name VARCHAR(50),
    coach_name VARCHAR(50),
    city VARCHAR(50),
    country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    team_id INT,
    position VARCHAR(50),
    age INT
);

CREATE TABLE player_stats (
    stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    points_scored INT,
    rebounds INT,
    assists INT
);

CREATE TABLE broadcasts (
    broadcast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    broadcast_date DATE,
    broadcast_time TIME,
    game_id INT,
    rating DECIMAL(3,1)
);
